## isMap() function

Checks if value is classified as a Map object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isMap: (value?: any) => value is Map<any, any>
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

value is Map&lt;any, any&gt;

Returns true if value is correctly classified, else false.
